result.purpose: This folder contains test data files for validating HTML documents and defining API test routes.
result.architecture: The folder follows a simple structure containing static HTML files and a JSON file for API route definitions, suitable for testing purposes.

.github/testdata/index.html.purpose: This file contains a simple HTML document displaying a greeting message.

.github/testdata/template-invalid.html.purpose: This file is a template that displays a title.

.github/testdata/testRoutes.json.purpose: Defines a set of test routes for an API, specifying HTTP methods and paths.
